tool_description: Find condos and townhouses in Florida (USA) and get access to the original listing service MLS with thousands of properties.
name: Florida Realty API
title: Florida Realty API

api_list.name: getListing
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get detailed information about a single condominium or townhouse.

required_parameters.name: identifier
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of a listing you'll got before from getListings.  Each OfferForPurchase has got an attribute named Identifier that is used  on this endpoint to get the details of the property.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com/realty/listings/M5215311859"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com/realty/listings/{identifier}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getImage
api_list.description: Load images of cities you retrieve by calling getCities().

required_parameters.name: filename
required_parameters.description: The name of the image to load.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com/realty/cities/images/capecoral.jpg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getCities
api_list.description: Get a list of supported cities with some data about those cities like the number of residents, the latitude, longitude, altitude  and a description and image of the city.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com/realty/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com/realty/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "florida-realty-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getListings
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve a list of condominiums and townhouses in Southwest Florida and on the East Coast.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Supported values are RELEVANCE (best match), NEWEST (newest first), PRICE_LOW (cheapest first), PRICE_HIGH (cheapest last). By default RELEVANCE is used.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: If you want to implement a paging use offset. The maximum items are defined by the parameter limit starting at offset For example, to return for the frist 10 items set offset to 0 and limit to 10. To return the next 10 items set offset to 10 and limit to 10 and so on. By default offset ist 0.

optional_parameters.name: price_max
optional_parameters.description: The maximum price of the condos and townhouses you search for in US Dollar. By default 250000 for $250,000 is used.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: Name of the city to search for condos and townhouses. Supported cities are Cape Coral, Fort Myers, West Palm Beach, Lake Worth, Lantana, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Boca Raton, Pompano Beach, Fort Lauderdale. New supported cities are Naples, Tampa and Saint Petersburg. By default Cape Coral is used.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return in the result list. By default 50 is used.
